factors.name: accrual
factors.label: Accrual
factors.description: Accrual anomaly - companies with low accruals (high quality earnings) outperform

factors.name: asset_growth
factors.label: Asset Growth
factors.description: Asset growth effect - companies with low asset growth (conservative management) outperform

factors.name: betting_against_beta
factors.label: Betting Against Beta
factors.description: Betting against beta - low beta stocks outperform high beta stocks

factors.name: breakout_value
factors.label: Breakout Value
factors.description: Value stocks filtered by Donchian breakout - catches value turning points

factors.name: consistent_momentum
factors.label: Consistent Momentum
factors.description: Consistent momentum: winners in both short and medium-term periods

factors.name: dividend_rotation
factors.label: Dividend Rotation
factors.description: High dividend yield + low volatility + earnings growth during rate normalization

factors.name: donchian
factors.label: Donchian
factors.description: 20-day Donchian Channel breakout strategy

factors.name: earnings_quality
factors.label: Earnings Quality
factors.description: Earnings quality: composite of accruals, ROE, CF/A, D/A

factors.name: five_factor_rotation
factors.label: Five Factor Rotation
factors.description: 5-axis side rotation using standalone factor fundamentals for each axis

factors.name: fscore_reversal
factors.label: Fscore Reversal
factors.description: F-Score + Reversal: quality losers outperform junk winners

factors.name: investment
factors.label: Investment
factors.description: Investment factor based on asset growth and capital expenditure patterns

factors.name: low_volatility
factors.label: Low Volatility
factors.description: Low volatility factor: long stable stocks, avoid volatile stocks

factors.name: macro_hedge
factors.label: Macro Hedge
factors.description: Fortress balance sheet stocks (low debt, high cash, positive CF) for macro protection

factors.name: momentum
factors.label: Momentum
factors.description: 12-1 momentum with downside volatility risk adjustment

factors.name: momentum_asset_growth
factors.label: Momentum Asset Growth
factors.description: Momentum + Asset Growth: momentum winners within high-growth stocks

factors.name: momentum_reversal_volatility
factors.label: Momentum Reversal Volatility
factors.description: Combined: momentum (40%) + reversal (30%) + low volatility (30%)

factors.name: pairs_trading
factors.label: Pairs Trading
factors.description: Pairs trading: mean reversion on correlated stock pairs

factors.name: profitability
factors.label: Profitability
factors.description: Profitability factor based on operating income and gross profit relative to total assets

factors.name: quality_momentum
factors.label: Quality Momentum
factors.description: Momentum + Profitability composite - avoids junk rallies

factors.name: quality_value
factors.label: Quality Value
factors.description: Value + Profitability composite - avoids value traps

factors.name: residual_momentum
factors.label: Residual Momentum
factors.description: Residual momentum: market-adjusted stock-specific momentum

factors.name: roa
factors.label: Roa
factors.description: ROA effect - companies with high return on assets outperform

factors.name: sector_rotation
factors.label: Sector Rotation
factors.description: Sector rotation: overweight stocks in top-performing sectors

factors.name: short_term_reversal
factors.label: Short Term Reversal
factors.description: Short-term reversal: long weekly losers, avoid weekly winners

factors.name: size_rotation
factors.label: Size Rotation
factors.description: Adaptive size rotation - tilts to winning size segment (small vs large caps)

factors.name: size_rotation_momentum
factors.label: Size Rotation Momentum
factors.description: Pure momentum within winning size segment (small vs large caps)

factors.name: size_rotation_quality
factors.label: Size Rotation Quality
factors.description: Size rotation + momentum + profitability (most sophisticated)

factors.name: sma
factors.label: Sma
factors.description: 10/30 SMA crossover - bullish when short MA > long MA

factors.name: small_cap
factors.label: Small Cap
factors.description: Pure small cap factor - favors smaller market cap stocks

factors.name: small_cap_momentum
factors.label: Small Cap Momentum
factors.description: Small cap + Momentum composite - captures discovery plays

factors.name: trend_following
factors.label: Trend Following
factors.description: Trend following: long stocks at/near all-time highs with momentum

factors.name: trend_value
factors.label: Trend Value
factors.description: Value stocks filtered by SMA uptrend - avoids value traps

factors.name: value
factors.label: Value
factors.description: Composite value score from E/P, FCF/P, OCF/EV, S/P, EBITDA/EV ratios

factors.name: xu100
factors.label: Xu100
factors.description: XU100 index with regime awareness - benchmark for risk management value
